title: ZZ Top Drummer Frank Beard Taking Leave of Absence Due to Health Issue
description: John Douglas will fill in while he's away. ZZ Top Drummer Frank Beard Taking Leave of Absence Due to Health Issue Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: ZZ Top’s longtime drummer, Frank Beard, is stepping away from the band "to attend a health issue." John Douglas has been tapped has his temporary replacement.
text: ZZ Top’s longtime drummer, Frank Beard, is temporarily stepping away from the band “to attend a health issue.” In his place,  ZZ Top members Billy F Gibbons and Elwood Francis have recruited longtime tech member, percussionist, and drummer John Douglas to join them on their ongoing “Elevation Tour,”  which is set to run through August. Get ZZ Top Tickets Here Douglas previously filled in for Beard in ZZ Top when he underwent an emergency appendectomy in 2002. The nature of Beard’s current health ailment was not disclosed, however a press statement says he’s “looking forward to a speedy recovery.”
html:
ZZ Top’s longtime drummer, Frank Beard, is temporarily stepping away from the band “to attend a health issue.”

In his place,  ZZ Top members Billy F Gibbons and Elwood Francis have recruited longtime tech member, percussionist, and drummer John Douglas to join them on their ongoing “Elevation Tour,”  which is set to run through August.

Get ZZ Top Tickets Here

Douglas previously filled in for Beard in ZZ Top when he underwent an emergency appendectomy in 2002.

The nature of Beard’s current health ailment was not disclosed, however a press statement says he’s “looking forward to a speedy recovery.”
